extendedInfo.description: Put the spark back in your love life.  Show your wife, girlfriend, husband or boyfriend how much you love them. The challengeâs main goal is to motivate you to do something special/romantic/sweet for your significant other every day for 30 days.  In the end you should have a stronger relationship.These suggestions are nothing new. You probably already do alot of them every once in a while. The key is however to do something daily for 30 days in a row. Most suggestions are simple and don't require alot of money or alot of planning. If there is one you can't or don't want to do you can always swap it for another activity or add your own custom activity. It doesnât matter what you do as long as it shows you care and as long as you keep it up for the whole 30 days.If you take on this challenge and stay committed there is a good chance that you will see your relationship grow stronger and that you and your mate will feel closer to each other.

reviews.title: Love is in the Air
reviews.comment: I LOVE this app. I wanted to do something to show my husband how much I love him. This app gave me simple yet meaningful ideas to show my love everyday in different ways. My husband was always pleasantly surprised of my love gestures and showed me love gestures in return, without even knowing about this app!!
reviews.author: Jennifer Hamra

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: I.ve read all your ideas And see i would need to change it to fit into my relationship But anything that will give my marriage back its spark is worth a try i.m. 3 days in trying your ideas and 5 days in trying to make my husband feel important enoughh to notice me. I think my marriage needs a lot of t.l.c  thank you for being hope.
reviews.author: Zoe Clark

reviews.title: Adorable but not really for marriages
reviews.comment: I find it more for kids than a real actual marriage r relationship the one for marriage/is love dare its based of of the movie fireproof u can get the book anywhere n it helps get ur relationship closer to gods with its 40day challenge now that app. Will be the best
reviews.author: Yolanda Williams

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: Helps to show him  beyond just saying i love you
reviews.author: Millie Sherrod

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: This is literally saving my marriage. My wife and I were growing apart and really struggling. Been doing this for 7 days now and there has already been so much improvement. Wish there was a 1 year version. My wife turned and gave me the biggest hug last night after yesterdays activity. This is definitely a must for any couple.
reviews.author: Don McClintock

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Its working to improve our relationship

reviews.comment: hope this work or i quit

reviews.comment: So far so good, there simple, romantic, and inexpensive gestures Iam totally gonna try and save my relationship. Reminds me of the movie fireproof lol

reviews.comment: Both myself & my husband are using this app.... it\'s fun and absolutely makes u remember why u love someone you\'ve been with for 20 years and have taken for granted....

reviews.title: So fun!!
reviews.comment: I love this! It helps make your partner feel important. It gave me things to do that i would have never thought of. My boyfriend loved the stuff ive been doing. ( been together 6months)

reviews.title: She deserve it
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for a week and my wife wants too know if I was switched with someone else it realy works I injoy it more than I thought it would. I\'ve done it all and loved it going to keep doing the wife deserves it and more. Need do one for a year.
